title.rendered: National Alliance for Eating Disorders: Referral Services

content.rendered:
About This Service

The National Alliance for Eating Disorders (The Alliance) is the leading national organization dedicated to the outreach, education, early intervention, support, and advocacy for all eating disorders.

The Alliance operates the nation’s largest, most comprehensive, and only free referral database for all levels of eating disorder treatment, findEDhelp.com

For more personalized information, individuals and loved ones can call our national toll-free helpline, 866-662-1235. The Alliance’s helpline is staffed by licensed and specialized therapists.

Referrals for all levels of specialized eating disorder care may also be accessed by visiting findEDhelp.com or by downloading the findEDhelp app in the Apple or Google Play app stores.

For questions about The Alliance’s free referral services, or more information about The Alliance’s other specialized services, please reach out to The Alliance at 866.662.1235 or info@allianceforeatingdisorders.com.
